template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a {business_type} that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a managed hosting provider that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Design a support workflow to triage tickets, auto-fix common issues, escalate complex cases, and track resolution metrics.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants a single-sentence prompt in plain English describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a managed hosting provider. Let me break down the requirements.

First, it needs to include triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking. All in one sentence under 40 words.

Hmm, maybe start with the main action: "Design a support workflow." Then mention triage to categorize issues. Next, auto-fix for common problems, escalate the rest, and track metrics. 

Wait, need to ensure it’s concise. "Triage tickets, auto-fix common issues, escalate complex cases, and track resolution metrics." That covers all points. Check word count… yes, under 40.
